timeline.message:
Implement Fleet Status Service (#335)

* Implment Fleet Status Service.

* Add more unit tests.

* Adding logic to handle getting dependencies fleet config from root components.

* Address PR comments.

* Fix build after addressing PR comments.

* Handle MQTT connection interruptions.

* fix build.

* Address PR comments.

* Address more PR comments. Move component to groups mapping in Deployment Service.

* Add unit test for DeploymentService.

* Fix build.

* Fix flaky unit test. Address some PR comments.

* Fix one more flaky test.

* Do not update FSS data during initialization.

* Fix build.

* Address PR comments.

* Refactor some code.

* Address PR comments.

* Address PR comments.

* Address more PR comments. Make publish topic configurable.

* Address PR comments on tests.

* Address PR comments

* Use const KERNEL_VERSION in tests.
fix the bug after renaming isAutostart()

* Initial work to support component plugin with integ test
